summary: REQ-40 and REQ-41 appear implemented via styling changes in `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx`: the header now uses a full-width blue Tailwind gradient (with dark-mode variants), retains sticky/top/z-index, blur and border, and foreground/button styles were adjusted for contrast (white text/icons with translucent hover/active backgrounds). No evidence in the diff summary indicates edits under immutable `frontend/src/components/ui` paths.
